data.name: John Brick Demo
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
